channel.title: Healthcare on Devashree Madhugiri

item.title: Stroke Prediction with Machine Learning
item.description: In this article, I share the details of how I built & evaluated a machine learning model for predicting stroke. The dataset used for this project is the Stroke Prediction Dataset from Kaggle and the model built predicts whether a patient is likely to get a stroke based on the input parameters like gender, age, various diseases, and smoking status. This article has been published on Medium. Read the full article here.
